name: Diamond Furnace
pages: The Diamond furnace is 4x more faster than the vanilla furnace, below is the recipe for it. This furnace can use any of these $(l:upgrades)upgrades/$, and requires either the $(l:patchouli:furnaces/amethyst_furnace)amethyst/$ or $(l:patchouli:furnaces/gold_furnace)gold furnace/$ to craft.
